name: 郭桂林
objective:
先修課程:4401011或負責教授同意
介紹結構體在受到張力、壓力、剪力、扭力及彎曲等外力狀態下之變形，分析應力，應變及變形，莫耳圓，壓力容器，樑，柱為目標。      

本課程係以Beer & Johnston所著之Mechanics of Materials 4th為教學範本，內容包括1. Concept of Stress 2. Stress and Strain-Axial Loading 3. Torsion 4. Pure Bending 5. Analysis and Design of Beams for Bending 6. Shearing Stresses in Beams and Thin-Walled Members 7. Transformations of Stress and Strain 8.. Deflection of Beams 9. Columns 10. Energy methods.
